tasks.title: Task Card UI Component System
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive task card component with visual task management inspired by claude-task-master
tasks.details: Build a reusable task card component system that displays tasks with their metadata, subtasks, dependencies, and progress indicators. Include color coding by priority, status badges, and interactive elements.
tasks.testStrategy: Render sample tasks with all combinations of priority, status, and dependency states. Verify visual hierarchy and readability.

subtasks.title: Create TaskCard base component
subtasks.description: Build the fundamental TaskCard React component with TypeScript types
subtasks.details: Create TaskCard.tsx in frontend/src/components/tasks/ with props interface for id, title, description, status, priority, dependencies, details, testStrategy, and subtasks. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

subtasks.title: Add status badge component
subtasks.description: Create visual status indicators with color coding
subtasks.details: Status badges: pending (gray), in-progress (blue), done (green), review (yellow), deferred (orange), cancelled (red). Use pill-shaped badges with icons.

subtasks.title: Add priority indicator component
subtasks.description: Visual priority markers (high/medium/low)
subtasks.details: Priority indicators: high (red flag), medium (yellow flag), low (gray flag). Position in top-right corner of card.

subtasks.title: Implement dependency visualization
subtasks.description: Show task dependencies with completion status
subtasks.details: Display dependencies as chips/pills with checkmarks (✅) for completed or clock icons (⏱️) for pending. Group at bottom of card.

subtasks.title: Add subtask progress tracker
subtasks.description: Visual progress bar for subtask completion
subtasks.details: Progress bar showing X/Y subtasks completed with percentage. Color transitions from red → yellow → green as completion increases.

subtasks.title: Create expandable details section
subtasks.description: Collapsible section for task details and test strategy
subtasks.details: Use accordion pattern. Click to expand/collapse. Show 'Details' and 'Test Strategy' in separate subsections with icons.

subtasks.title: Implement subtask list rendering
subtasks.description: Nested display of subtasks within parent task card
subtasks.details: Render subtasks as indented mini-cards. Show subtask title, status, and dependencies. Support clicking to expand subtask details.

subtasks.title: Add action buttons (start, complete, defer)
subtasks.description: Interactive buttons to change task status
subtasks.details: Buttons: 'Start Task' (pending → in-progress), 'Mark Complete' (any → done), 'Defer' (any → deferred). Show conditionally based on current status.

tasks.title: Task Data Model & Type System
tasks.description: Define TypeScript types and interfaces for task management system
tasks.details: Create comprehensive type definitions following claude-task-master structure. Include Task, Subtask, TaskStatus, TaskPriority, and TaggedTaskList interfaces.
tasks.testStrategy: TypeScript compilation with strict mode. Create sample data objects to verify type safety.

subtasks.title: Define TaskStatus enum
subtasks.description: Create enum for all possible task states
subtasks.details: enum TaskStatus { PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, DONE, REVIEW, DEFERRED, CANCELLED }

subtasks.title: Define TaskPriority enum
subtasks.description: Create enum for task priority levels
subtasks.details: enum TaskPriority { HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW }

subtasks.title: Create Subtask interface
subtasks.description: Define subtask data structure
subtasks.details: interface Subtask { id: number; title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; dependencies: number[]; details: string; }

subtasks.title: Create Task interface
subtasks.description: Define main task data structure
subtasks.details: interface Task { id: number; title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; dependencies: number[]; priority: TaskPriority; details: string; testStrategy: string; subtasks: Subtask[]; }

subtasks.title: Create TaggedTaskList interface
subtasks.description: Define structure for tagged task organization
subtasks.details: interface TaggedTaskList { [tag: string]: { tasks: Task[] } }. Supports multi-context task management like 'master', 'feature-x', etc.

subtasks.title: Add TaskComplexity type
subtasks.description: Define complexity analysis structure
subtasks.details: interface TaskComplexity { taskId: number; complexityScore: number; recommendedSubtasks: number; expansionPrompt: string; }

tasks.title: Backend Task Management API Endpoints
tasks.description: Create FastAPI endpoints for task CRUD operations with subtask support
tasks.details: Implement RESTful API endpoints following repository pattern. Support tagged task lists, subtask management, status updates, and dependency validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Write pytest tests for each endpoint. Test dependency validation, circular dependency detection, and tag isolation.

subtasks.title: Create Task Pydantic models
subtasks.description: Define Pydantic models for request/response validation
subtasks.details: Create TaskCreate, TaskUpdate, TaskResponse, SubtaskCreate, SubtaskUpdate models in src/core/task_models.py. Match TypeScript interfaces.

subtasks.title: Implement task database schema
subtasks.description: Design SQLite schema for tasks and subtasks
subtasks.details: Tables: tasks (task_id, title, description, status, priority, tag, user_id, created_at, updated_at), subtasks (subtask_id, task_id, title, description, status, details, created_at, updated_at), task_dependencies (task_id, depends_on_task_id).

subtasks.title: Create TaskRepository
subtasks.description: Build repository layer for task data access
subtasks.details: Extend BaseRepository. Methods: create_task, update_task, delete_task, get_task, get_all_tasks_by_tag, add_dependency, remove_dependency, validate_dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement GET /api/v1/tasks/tagged endpoints
subtasks.description: Endpoints for tagged task list retrieval
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/tagged?user_id=X&tag=master - returns all tasks in tag. GET /api/v1/tasks/tagged/all?user_id=X - returns all tags with their tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement POST /api/v1/tasks/create endpoint
subtasks.description: Create new task with optional subtasks
subtasks.details: POST /api/v1/tasks/create with TaskCreate body. Validate dependencies exist. Auto-assign task ID. Support creating subtasks in same request.

subtasks.title: Implement PUT /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/status endpoint
subtasks.description: Update task status with validation
subtasks.details: PUT /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/status?new_status=done. Validate status transitions. Send WebSocket event on update.

subtasks.title: Implement dependency validation logic
subtasks.description: Validate dependencies and detect circular references
subtasks.details: Create validate_dependencies() function. Check: 1) Dependencies exist in same tag, 2) No circular references (DFS cycle detection), 3) Dependencies are not self-referential.

subtasks.title: Add subtask management endpoints
subtasks.description: CRUD endpoints for subtasks
subtasks.details: POST /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/subtasks, PUT /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/subtasks/{subtask_id}, DELETE /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/subtasks/{subtask_id}.

tasks.title: Task Dashboard UI Page
tasks.description: Create comprehensive task dashboard with filtering, sorting, and tag switching
tasks.details: Build full-page task dashboard at /tasks route. Display task cards in grid/list view. Support filtering by status, priority, tag. Show task statistics and progress charts.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various task datasets. Verify filtering, sorting, and tag switching work correctly. Test mobile responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Create TaskDashboard page component
subtasks.description: Main dashboard page at /tasks route
subtasks.details: Create frontend/src/app/tasks/page.tsx. Use Next.js App Router. Implement layout with header, filters, and task grid.

subtasks.title: Implement tag selector dropdown
subtasks.description: Dropdown to switch between task tags/contexts
subtasks.details: Dropdown shows all available tags (master, feature-x, etc.). Current tag highlighted. Fetch tasks for selected tag on change.

subtasks.title: Add filter panel (status, priority)
subtasks.description: Filter controls for narrowing task list
subtasks.details: Checkboxes for status (pending, in-progress, done, etc.) and priority (high, medium, low). Multi-select support. Clear filters button.

subtasks.title: Implement task search bar
subtasks.description: Real-time search across task titles and descriptions
subtasks.details: Search input with debounce (300ms). Highlights matching tasks. Searches title, description, and details fields.

subtasks.title: Add sorting controls
subtasks.description: Sort tasks by priority, ID, status, or dependencies
subtasks.details: Dropdown selector: Sort by Priority, ID, Status, Dependency Count. Ascending/descending toggle. Default: Priority (high first) → ID (low first).

subtasks.title: Create task statistics panel
subtasks.description: Summary stats dashboard (total, completed, in-progress, etc.)
subtasks.details: Show: Total tasks, Completed count, In Progress count, Pending count, Completion percentage. Use card layout with icons.

subtasks.title: Implement task grid/list rendering
subtasks.description: Render TaskCard components in responsive grid
subtasks.details: CSS Grid layout. 1 column mobile, 2 columns tablet, 3 columns desktop. Gap between cards. Support list view toggle.

subtasks.title: Add 'Create Task' modal
subtasks.description: Modal dialog for creating new tasks
subtasks.details: Form fields: title, description, priority, tag, details, test strategy. Dependency multi-select dropdown. Add subtasks button. Validate before submission.

tasks.title: Task Complexity Analysis System
tasks.description: AI-powered task complexity analysis inspired by claude-task-master
tasks.details: Analyze task complexity using AI to recommend optimal subtask breakdown. Generate expansion prompts tailored to each task. Create complexity reports in JSON format.
tasks.testStrategy: Analyze sample tasks with various complexity levels. Verify complexity scores (1-10) and subtask recommendations are reasonable.

subtasks.title: Create complexity analysis prompt template
subtasks.description: Design AI prompt for task complexity assessment
subtasks.details: Prompt should analyze: 1) Technical complexity, 2) Scope/breadth, 3) Dependencies, 4) Estimated effort. Return complexity score (1-10) and recommended subtask count.

subtasks.title: Implement analyze_complexity API endpoint
subtasks.description: POST endpoint to analyze one or all tasks
subtasks.details: POST /api/v1/tasks/analyze-complexity?task_id=X or ?all=true. Calls AI model with complexity prompt. Returns ComplexityAnalysis object.

subtasks.title: Create complexity report generation
subtasks.description: Generate and save complexity analysis reports
subtasks.details: Save reports to docs/task-splitting/complexity-report-{timestamp}.json. Include: per-task analysis, complexity distribution stats, expansion commands.

subtasks.title: Implement task expansion from complexity data
subtasks.description: Auto-generate subtasks based on complexity analysis
subtasks.details: POST /api/v1/tasks/{task_id}/expand. Uses complexity report recommendations. Calls AI with expansion prompt. Creates subtasks automatically.

subtasks.title: Add complexity visualization to UI
subtasks.description: Display complexity scores on task cards
subtasks.details: Show complexity score (1-10) as color-coded badge. Green (1-3), Yellow (4-6), Orange (7-8), Red (9-10). Add 'Expand' button for high-complexity tasks.

tasks.title: Task 'Next' Recommendation System
tasks.description: Smart recommendation system to suggest the next task to work on
tasks.details: Implement algorithm to identify the next actionable task based on dependencies, priority, and status. Similar to claude-task-master's 'next' command.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various task graphs. Verify it correctly identifies unblocked high-priority tasks. Handle edge cases (all tasks blocked, all tasks done).

subtasks.title: Implement next task algorithm
subtasks.description: Logic to determine next actionable task
subtasks.details: Algorithm: 1) Filter pending/in-progress tasks, 2) Filter tasks with satisfied dependencies, 3) Sort by priority (high first), then dependency count (low first), then ID (low first). Return top result.

subtasks.title: Create GET /api/v1/tasks/next endpoint
subtasks.description: API endpoint to fetch recommended next task
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/next?user_id=X&tag=master. Returns full task object with dependency status info. Includes suggested actions.

subtasks.title: Add 'Next Task' UI component
subtasks.description: Prominent card showing recommended next task
subtasks.details: Display at top of task dashboard. Large card with title, description, priority, and 'Start Task' button. Show dependency completion status.

subtasks.title: Implement dependency status visualization
subtasks.description: Show which dependencies are blocking or satisfied
subtasks.details: List task dependencies with checkmarks (✅ done) or clocks (⏱️ pending). Helps user understand what's blocking the next task.

tasks.title: Mobile Task Management Interface
tasks.description: Mobile-optimized task management UI for on-the-go task updates
tasks.details: Create mobile-friendly task interface at /mobile/tasks. Swipe gestures for status updates. Touch-optimized controls. Quick actions for common operations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on iOS and Android devices. Verify touch targets are 44x44px minimum. Test swipe gestures and animations.

subtasks.title: Create mobile task list view
subtasks.description: Simplified task cards for mobile screens
subtasks.details: Compact task cards: title, status badge, priority indicator. Tap to expand details. Single column layout. Virtualized scrolling for performance.

subtasks.title: Implement swipe gestures
subtasks.description: Swipe left/right for quick status changes
subtasks.details: Swipe right: Mark complete. Swipe left: Defer/delete. Show action hints during swipe. Animate card slide and color change.

subtasks.title: Add quick action bottom sheet
subtasks.description: Bottom sheet modal for task actions
subtasks.details: Slides up from bottom. Actions: Start Task, Mark Complete, Defer, Edit, Delete. Large touch targets (56px height). Backdrop dismiss.

subtasks.title: Implement pull-to-refresh
subtasks.description: Refresh task list by pulling down
subtasks.details: Standard pull-to-refresh pattern. Loading spinner. Refetches tasks from API. Success feedback animation.

subtasks.title: Add floating action button (FAB)
subtasks.description: Quick create task button
subtasks.details: Fixed position bottom-right. Plus icon. Opens create task modal. Material Design style. Hides on scroll down, shows on scroll up.

tasks.title: Task Dependency Validation & Cycle Detection
tasks.description: Robust dependency validation system with circular reference detection
tasks.details: Implement graph algorithms to detect circular dependencies. Validate dependencies exist and are within same tag. Prevent invalid dependency chains.
tasks.testStrategy: Create test cases with circular dependencies (A→B→C→A). Verify detection and error messages. Test cross-tag dependency rejection.

subtasks.title: Implement DFS cycle detection algorithm
subtasks.description: Depth-first search to find circular dependencies
subtasks.details: Function: detect_circular_dependencies(tasks: Task[]). Returns list of cycles found. Uses DFS with visited/recursion stack tracking. Handles disconnected graphs.

subtasks.title: Create dependency validation rules
subtasks.description: Define and implement validation constraints
subtasks.details: Rules: 1) Dependencies must exist in same tag, 2) No self-dependencies (task→task), 3) No circular chains, 4) Referenced tasks must exist. Return validation errors with details.

subtasks.title: Implement validate-dependencies endpoint
subtasks.description: API endpoint to validate all dependencies in a tag
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/validate-dependencies?tag=master. Returns validation report: valid (true/false), errors array, warnings array, cycle details.

subtasks.title: Add real-time validation in create/update
subtasks.description: Validate dependencies on task creation/updates
subtasks.details: Run validation before committing task changes. Return 400 error if validation fails. Include detailed error message explaining the issue.

subtasks.title: Create dependency graph visualization
subtasks.description: Visual representation of task dependency graph
subtasks.details: Use D3.js or React Flow. Nodes = tasks, Edges = dependencies. Color-code nodes by status. Highlight cycles in red. Zoom/pan support.

tasks.title: Task Progress Gamification Integration
tasks.description: Integrate task completion with existing gamification system
tasks.details: Award XP for task completion. Higher complexity tasks = more XP. Achievements for task streaks, all tasks complete, etc. Update progress API with task data.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete tasks and verify XP awards. Check achievement unlocks. Verify WebSocket events fire correctly.

subtasks.title: Define XP award formula
subtasks.description: Calculate XP based on task properties
subtasks.details: Formula: Base XP (10) + Priority multiplier (high=2x, med=1.5x, low=1x) + Complexity multiplier (score/5). Subtask completion awards 20% of parent XP.

subtasks.title: Hook task completion to XP system
subtasks.description: Award XP when tasks marked as done
subtasks.details: In status update endpoint, if new_status == 'done', call gamification service to award XP. Include task details in event payload.

subtasks.title: Create task-specific achievements
subtasks.description: Define achievements for task completion milestones
subtasks.details: Achievements: 'First Task' (1 task), 'Getting Started' (5 tasks), 'Task Master' (25 tasks), 'Dependency Champion' (complete task with 5+ deps), 'Complexity Crusher' (complete complexity 9+ task).

subtasks.title: Add task completion celebrations
subtasks.description: Confetti and animations on task completion
subtasks.details: Trigger confetti animation when marking task complete. Show XP gained notification. Play success sound (optional). Animate task card fade-out.

subtasks.title: Implement task completion streaks
subtasks.description: Track consecutive days of task completions
subtasks.details: Store last_task_completion_date per user. Increment streak if completed task today and yesterday. Reset if gap > 1 day. Show streak in dashboard.

tasks.title: Task Export & Import System
tasks.description: Export tasks to various formats (JSON, Markdown, CSV) and import from external sources
tasks.details: Support exporting tasks for backup, sharing, or migration. Import tasks from JSON or CSV. Generate markdown reports for documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Export tasks to all formats and verify data integrity. Import exported data and check round-trip accuracy.

subtasks.title: Implement JSON export
subtasks.description: Export full task structure to JSON
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/export/json?tag=master. Returns complete TaggedTaskList JSON. Include all metadata, subtasks, dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement Markdown export
subtasks.description: Generate readable markdown task reports
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/export/markdown?tag=master. Format: # Task ID - Title, ## Description, ### Subtasks list. Include status badges and dependency info.

subtasks.title: Implement CSV export
subtasks.description: Export tasks as CSV for spreadsheet import
subtasks.details: GET /api/v1/tasks/export/csv?tag=master. Columns: ID, Title, Description, Status, Priority, Dependencies (comma-sep), Details, Test Strategy. Flatten subtasks as separate rows.

subtasks.title: Create JSON import endpoint
subtasks.description: Import tasks from JSON file
subtasks.details: POST /api/v1/tasks/import/json. Upload JSON file. Validate structure matches TaggedTaskList. Merge or replace existing tasks (user choice). Return import summary.

subtasks.title: Add export UI controls
subtasks.description: Download buttons for each export format
subtasks.details: Dropdown menu: Export as JSON, Markdown, CSV. Trigger browser download. Show success toast notification.

tasks.title: Quick Capture AI Intelligence
tasks.description: Enhanced AI-powered task capture with Auto Mode and Clarity Mode (COMPLETED)
tasks.details: Implemented dual-mode task capture with voice-to-text support and AI enhancement
tasks.testStrategy: Tested with various input formats and verified AI processing quality

tasks.title: Energy API Integration
tasks.details: Created GET endpoint with time-based energy estimation
tasks.testStrategy: Verified energy levels at different times of day
